name: Loading Simulator
description:
A game for the most patient! Loading has never been so exciting! If you love downloads and puzzles, this is what you're looking for!

Take advantage of the slowest and strangest computer on the planet earth. Use the applications, the desktop, search the Recycle Bin, and find out what's wrong with this computer! A fascinating and unusual quest full of different riddles and of course waiting for loading awaits you.

Game Features:
*Unusual and fascinating quest
*Many ramifications and possible actions
*A lot of humor
*Lots of loading screens
